thread.title: 15M customers affected by data breach that included Social Security numbers, more
thread.title_full: 15M T-Mobile customers affected by Experian data breach that included Social Security numbers, more - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 15M customers affected by data breach that included Social Security numbers, more
text: T-Mobile has confirmed this evening that as many as have been affected by a data breach. As the company is quick to point out, however, the breach did not occur on its servers, but rather its credit partner’s, Experian. While Experian and T-Mobile both confirm that no credit card or banking […] »
